div.div:
Present form with question about
access to the protected resource

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 326px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.font: Do you grant access to the resource for application X ?
